articleinfo.releaseinfo: This manual describes version 2.14 of the Panel Trash applet.

legalnotice.title: Feedback
legalnotice.para: To report a bug or make a suggestion regarding the Panel Trash applet or this manual, follow the directions in the GNOME Feedback Page.

sect1.title: Inleiding
sect1.para: The Panel Trash applet lets you manage your Trash from the panel.
De prullenbak op uw paneel gedraagt zich precies hetzelfde als de prullenbak op uw desktop, maar is handiger in gebruik, omdat uw panelen altijd zichtbaar zijn.

sect2.title: Adding Panel Trash to a Panel
sect2.para: To add the Panel Trash applet to a panel, perform the following steps:

listitem.para: Right-click on the panel at the place you want to add the applet.
Scroll down the list of items in the Add to Panel dialog, then select Trash.

sect2.para: For more information on working with the panel, see the Desktop User Guide.

sect2.title: Moving Items to Trash
sect2.para: To move items to the Trash, drag them from the file manager to the Panel Trash applet.

sect2.title: Prullenbak wordt geleegd
sect2.para:
To permanently delete all the items in the Trash, right-click on the applet, then choose
Empty Trash .

sect2.title: Bezig met openen van Prullenbak
sect2.para:
To open Trash, right-click on the applet, then choose
Open . The Trash window opens in Nautilus file manager.
